quest_name: Warrior Epic 1.0 - Jagged Blade of War

steps.description: Speak to Kargek Redblade in East Freeport to begin the epic quest.
Kill a goblin in Warsliks Woods and loot the Ancient Sword Blade.
Kill Cazic Thule in Plane of Fear and loot the Runed Sword Hilt.
Give Ancient Sword Blade and Runed Sword Hilt to Kargek Redblade in East Freeport to receive the Completed Redblade Sword.
Kill Venril Sathir in Karnor’s Castle and loot the Greenmist Blade.
Kill an undead knight in City of Mist and loot the Spirit Bound Hilt.
Give Greenmist Blade and Spirit Bound Hilt to Kargek Redblade in East Freeport to receive the Combined Greenmist Blade.
Kill Lord Rak'Ashiir in City of Mist and loot the Enchanted Warblade.
Give Completed Redblade Sword, Combined Greenmist Blade, and Enchanted Warblade to Kargek Redblade in East Freeport to receive the Warrior Epic 1.0 - Jagged Blade of War.
